chart_description: This chart shows the memory usage of the swap space by different applications on the system.

dimension_descriptions.containers: The amount of memory used by containers on the system’s swap space.
dimension_descriptions.go.d.plugin: The amount of memory used by the go.d.plugin.
dimension_descriptions.kube-proxy: The amount of memory used by the kube-proxy.
dimension_descriptions.kubelet: The amount of memory used by the kubelet.
dimension_descriptions.netdata: The amount of memory used by the Netdata daemon.
dimension_descriptions.other: The amount of memory used by other applications that are not captured in the other dimensions.
dimension_descriptions.sql: The amount of memory used by SQL-related processes.
dimension_descriptions.system: The amount of memory used by system processes.
dimension_descriptions.tc-qos-helper: The amount of memory used by the traffic control helper.
